# el-pagination



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description              | Type      | Default |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `page`            | `page`              | Current page (1-indexed) | `number`  | `1`     |
| `pageSize`        | `page-size`         | Items per page           | `number`  | `10`    |
| `showSizeChanger` | `show-size-changer` | Show page size changer   | `boolean` | `false` |
| `total`           | `total`             | Total number of items    | `number`  | `0`     |


## Events

| Event          | Description | Type                  |
| -------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `elPageChange` |             | `CustomEvent<number>` |
